trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnBeginResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os métodos <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnBeginResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs> contains information used by an activity designer when a user resized the activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs> contém informações usadas por um designer de atividade quando um usuário redimensionado o designer de atividade em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This information includes the designer edge that is being used to resize the designer and the designer's new bounds.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações incluem a borda de designer que está sendo usada para redimensionar o designer e limites de nova do designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> to use to resize the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> a ser usado para redimensionar o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the resized bounds of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites redimensionados do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> value and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> usando o valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> e o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new bounding rectangle for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo retângulo delimitador para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> na superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the new bounds of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os novos limites do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge used to resize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a borda de designer usada para redimensionar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> used to resize the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> usado para redimensionar o designer de atividade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.
